titles.title: Restoring Integrity in Democracy Resolution
Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit Members of the House from serving on the boards of for-profit entities.
Restoring Integrity in Democracy Resolution

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ethics.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Restoring Integrity in Democracy Resolution
This resolution prohibits Members, Delegates, or the Resident Commissioner of the House from serving on the boards of for-profit entities.
